apps.author: ImranR98
apps.name: Obtainium
apps.changeLog:
## What's Changed
* Update it.json by @unbranched in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1351
* Update hu.json by @gidano in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1350

* Update pt translation by @jont4 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1357
* Translation of the Note of the sources window by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1361
* Correctly report and auto-delete bad APKs (#1251) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1363
* Add DeepL translations as placeholders by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1364
* Update de.json by @heuwerk in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1365

apps.author: beemdevelopment
apps.name: Aegis
apps.changeLog:
## New features

* An optional 'name' field for icon packs to bypass filename character restrictions

## Fixed bugs

* The Authenticator Pro importer only supported the legacy backup format
* A crash could occur in the tile service

apps.author: AnySoftKeyboard
apps.name: AnySoftKeyboard
apps.changeLog:
* Minimum Android version is 4.0.3 (ICS, API level 15).
* Basic support for OS field auto-fill.
* Better vibration control for newer OS versions.
* Fixes around permission requests.
* Fixes for colorized nav-bar.
* A few small gesture-typing fixes.
* Other bug fixes.
* Updated translations from the community.

More: https://github.com/AnySoftKeyboard/AnySoftKeyboard/milestone/93

apps.author: bitfireAT
apps.name: DAVx‚Åµ
apps.changeLog:
4.3.12.1: hotfix for AGP problem that caused random exceptions (#511)

4.3.12:

* [CalDAV] fix StackOverflowError when timezone definitions refer to time zones themselves
* [CalDAV] fix reminder type of default event reminders
* [WebDAV] less strict MIME type processing to increase compatibility
* [Nextcloud] always append /remote.php/dav so that it also works without well-known URLs
* other minor bug fixes and improvements (including further rewriting to Compose)

apps.author: vector-im
apps.name: Element
apps.changeLog:
Changes in Element v1.6.10 (2024-01-09)
=======================================

Features ‚ú®
----------
 - Add support for Mobile Device Management.
  The keys are:
  - default homeserver URL `im.vector.app.serverConfigDefaultHomeserverUrlString`
  - push gateway URL `im.vector.app.serverConfigSygnalAPIUrlString`
  - permalink base URL `im.vector.app.clientPermalinkBaseUrl` ([#8698](https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/issues/8698))
 - Support Functional members (https://github.com/element-hq/element-meta/blob/develop/spec/functional_members.md) ([#3736](https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/issues/3736))

Bugfixes üêõ
----------
 - Fix some issues related to edition and reply of events. ([#5969](https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/issues/5969))
 - Fix crypto migration from kotlin to rust when an account has a single session and no backup. ([#8666](https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/issues/8666))

## What's Changed
* Support Functional members #3736 by @ganfra in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8700
* Sync SAS Strings by @github-actions in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8706
* Implement Mobile Device Manager feature with 3 keys. by @bmarty in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8698
* Change jitsi-meet constants URL by @Amir-yazdanmanesh in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8672
* Bump io.element.android:wysiwyg from 2.14.1 to 2.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8711
* Element hq by @bmarty in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8710
* Move crypto migration by @yostyle in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8666
* Sync analytics plan by @github-actions in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8577
* Try fixing exodus CI job by @jmartinesp in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8721
* GH actions: remove triaging process and old GH projects by @manuroe in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8724
* Fix a bunch of issues related to edition and reply #5969 by @ganfra in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8716
* Bump io.element.android:wysiwyg from 2.22.0 to 2.24.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8727

## New Contributors
* @Amir-yazdanmanesh made their first contribution in https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/pull/8672

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/element-hq/element-android/compare/v1.6.8...v1.6.10

apps.author: nextcloud
apps.name: Nextcloud
apps.changeLog:
## 3.27.0 (December 12, 2023)

- account deletion (needs server app drop_account)
- Material Design 3 everywhere
- live photo support


Minimum: NC 16 Server, Android 7.0 Nougat

For a full list, please see https://github.com/nextcloud/android/milestone/86

apps.author: QuantumBadger
apps.name: RedReader
apps.changeLog:
* Added a preference to automatically open the first image in an album
* Made links blue again in dark themes
* Added post tap action preference: open link, open comments, or use old "post title opens comments" behaviour
* Fixed long-click menu not appearing when post tap action changed from the default
* Reduced top and bottom margins on popup menus to avoid the need for scrolling
* Increase number of comments shown in user profile from 25 to 100

apps.author: Julien Veyssier
apps.name: PhoneTrack
apps.changeLog:
# Change Log
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](http://keepachangelog.com/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/).

## [Unreleased]
## 0.1.0 ‚Äì 2020-06-25
### Changed
- apply new design (like NC Notes and NC Files)
[#206](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/206) @stefan-niedermann

## 0.0.19 ‚Äì 2020-06-22
### Added
- ability to import MapsForge files from anywhere and store them in app data
- display device history in map (local+remote data), able to toggle and filter history
[#199](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/199) [#134](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/134) @tgc12 @Valdnet
- option to be able to rotate the map
- export local logjob points to GPX

### Changed
- update OsmDroid to 6.1.6 which fixes display bug and brings MapsForge v5 compat
[#183](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/183) @Valdnet
- improve main sidebar layout
- display NC account avatar in sidebar
- use color gradient everywhere
- remove 'read contacts' permission finally not necessary for SSO
- update SSO lib to 0.5.1

### Fixed
- fix logging with keepGpsOn which was stopped after getting the first point
[#197](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/197) @DavidMndz @huste
- get rid of takisoft stuff and fix some resources to be able to update gradle
- map sidebar display with lots of devices
- keep map sidebar device list scroll state on data update

## 0.0.18 ‚Äì 2020-04-13
### Added
- system to fix buggy GPS chips time results
[!10](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/-/merge_requests/10) @quite
- logjob config presets (bike, walk, drive, battery, max presicion)
[#184](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/184) @tmannn.24

### Changed
- increase zoom margin in map
[#177](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/177) @huste
- improve LoggerService, drop requestSingleUpdate, use requestLocationUpdates
[#179](https:...

apps.author: jellyfin
apps.name: Jellyfin
apps.changeLog:
Improvements to the Jellyfin mobile experience are here. Read the [blog post](https://jellyfin.org/posts/android-v2.6.0) to learn about the changes in this release, or read the changelog below.

## üèóÔ∏è Enhancements

- Add dvbsub to ExoPlayer subtitle codecs #1081, by [@jmarcet](https://github.com/jmarcet)
- Pre\-fill last hostname and add history to suggestions in connect screen #1134, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)
- Introduce BackPressInterceptor #1172, by [@timm0e](https://github.com/timm0e)
- Allow to exit from fullscreen with the back button in ExoPlayer #1173, by [@timm0e](https://github.com/timm0e)

## üîß Bugfixes

- Fix VLC external player crashing on Android 13 #1103, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)
- Fix app returning to WebViewFragment when activity restarts #1171, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)
- Fix integrated player crashing on Android 14 #1180, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)
- Ensure ExternalPlayer always direct plays #1181, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)
- Prevent keyboard \(dis\)connection from restarting the app #1187, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)
- Fix bluetooth event handling #1188, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)

## üîÉ Refactoring

- Fix deprecation and extract method #1161, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)
- Remove unnecessary defaults from device profiles #1183, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)

## üí° Everything else

- Update compile and target SDK to 34 #1160, by [@Maxr1998](https://github.com/Maxr1998)

## üìà Dependency updates

- Update androidx\-lifecycle to v2\.6\.1 #990, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update compose by renovate\[bot\] v1\.5\.0 #1151, v1\.4\.3 #1003
- Update compose\-material to v1\.4\.3 \- autoclosed #1005, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update dependency androidx\.activity:activity\-ktx to v1\.7\.2 #1057, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update androidx\.compose\.foundation:foundation by renovate\[bot\] v1\.5\.0 #1156, v1\.4\.3 #1058
- Update dependency androidx\.core:core\-ktx to v1\.10\.1 #1062, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update dependency com\.google\.android\.material:material to v1\.9\.0 #1067, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update github/codeql\-action action by renovate\[bot\] v2\.20\.1 #1112, v2\.3\.6 #1102, v2\.3\.5 #1086
- Update dependency io\.coil\-kt:coil\-base to v2\.4\.0 #1092, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update dependency de\.mannodermaus\.android\-junit5 to v1\.9\.3\.0 \- autoclosed #1093, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update kotest to v5\.6\.2 #1095, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update dependency org\.chromium\.net:cronet\-embedded to v113 \- autoclosed #1096, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update playservices to v21\.3\.0 #1097, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update dependency androidx\.webkit:webkit to v1\.7\.0 #1098, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update burnett01/rsync\-deployments action by renovate\[bot\] v6 #1106, v5\.2\.2 #1100
- Update android\.plugin by renovate\[bot\] v8\.1\.1 #1167, v8\.1\.0 #1141, v8 \(major\) #1101
- Update dependency io\.insert\-koin:koin\-android to v3\.4\.2 #1104, by renovate\[bot\]
- Update androidx\.fragment:fragment\-ktx by renovate\[bot\] v1\.6\.1 #1143, v1\.6\.0 #1105

apps.author: home-assistant
apps.name: Home Assistant
apps.changeLog:
## What's Changed
* Bump actions/cache from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4143
* Support multiple Template tiles on Wear OS by @slovdahl in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3783
* Integrate car sensors with automotive, and added permissions by @ivancea in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4122
* Bump horologist from 0.5.14 to 0.5.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4137
* Bump io.sentry:sentry-android from 7.1.0 to 7.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4138
* Replace 'Refresh interval' title with icon by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4144
* Remove Thread credential sync from start of Matter commissioning flow by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4150
* Bump play services location dependency by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4155
* Bump horologist from 0.5.18 to 0.5.19 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4156
* Bump com.google.devtools.ksp from 1.9.22-1.0.16 to 1.9.22-1.0.17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4157
* Support image entity in camera widget (now renamed picture widget) by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4159
* Androidx dependency updates late Jan 2024 by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4165
* Update change log week of 1/26 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4163
* Bump accompanist from 0.32.0 to 0.34.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4161
* Bump horologist from 0.5.19 to 0.5.20 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4170
* Bump gradle/wrapper-validation-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4171
* Wear Assist: show login when logged out, scroll first item into view by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4174
* Bump gradle/gradle-build-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4169

## New Contributors
* @ivancea made their first contribution in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4122

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/home-assistant/android/compare/2024.1.2...2024.1.5
